akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3907. Other judicial review prohibited Except as expressly authorized by this chapter and chapter 5 of title 3, the compliance or noncompliance with the provisions of chapter 5 of title 3, and any action taken pursuant to chapter 5 of title 3, shall not be subject to judicial review. (Added Pub. L. 104–331, § 3(c), Oct. 26, 1996, 110 Stat. 4071.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective Oct. 1, 1997, see section 3(d) of Pub. L. 104–331, set out as a note under section 1296 of this title.
